alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 1:36PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern St. Johns County through 215 PM EDT... At 136 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Federal Point, or 7 miles northeast of Hastings, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Saint Augustine Beach, Crescent Beach, Saint Augustine Shores, Butler Beach, Vilano Beach, Saint Augustine South, Spuds, Anastasia and Dupont Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns
